::Shadow Wing::

She could hardly contain herself.  She hoped that this was the answer 
to her prayers.  If only he could fix Lunarpine's eyes, she thought, 
he would be able to see again. She was just overjoyed inside.
"uh, my friend is Lunarpine over there. He's very touchy right now 
about his lost vision. If you could maybe talk to him, in a round-a-
about sort of way, about fixing his optics. I'd be forever gratefull 
to you." She was happy and worried at the same time.  She hoped 
Lunarpine wouldn't be mad at her for pulling this stund on him like 
this.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, TrikeJacob@n... wrote:
> Stegotron: Sure. Where is your freind and when do I start?
